title: Gohobi Ha Karada De Haratte Shachosan
description:
Description :
        Ookami is at the end of his rope trying to find a suitable secretary. In his desperation, he decides to launch the "Rent A Boyfriend" app to enlist the help of Mao, a rental boyfriend. When they meet in person, Ookami realizes that Mao is even more gorgeous than his photos, and finds himself bewitched by the handsome man. Before he can even make sense of what's happening, Mao's tongue is in his mouth as they share a passionate kiss. Ookami's protestations only spur Mao on: "What's with that scary face? You're just turning me on even more." As things escalate, Ookami chides him: "You have no regard for others." But Mao takes no heed, continuing to work Ookami up into a frenzy... Check out this new, erotic love story between a mistrustful boss and his aggressive boy toy!
